learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): [IMAGE] In this sentence, what could you substitute for the word demurely? [IMAGE] In...

p.b: Sara sat demurely, with her hands in her lap, and waited for the teacher to call her name.

questionBody.p: In this sentence, what could you substitute for the word demurely?

simpleChoice.p: another adverb that describes how Sara sat
another verb that tells what Sara did
another noun that names the furniture Sara sat on
